naslov: Dugoročan najam kamene vile u Vrsine (iznajmljivanje)
opis: U Vrsine smjestila se luksuzna renovirana vila koja čeka svoje nove stanare. Na gornjem katu vile nalaze se dvije prostrane spavaće sobe, svaka opremljena bračnim krevetom i jednim malim krevetom. Svaka soba ima svoju kupaonicu s kadom, idealnom za opuštajuće trenutke nakon dugog dana. Dok istražujete donji kat, dočekat će vas još jedna spavaća soba koja se može koristiti i kao radna soba, uz kupaonicu s tušem i perilicom rublja. Srce vile čini prostrani dnevni boravak povezan s modernom kuhinjom. Iz dnevnog boravka izlazite na terasu s ležaljkama za sunčanje i grijanim bazenom. Za unošenje posebne atmosfere, tu je i vanjska prostorija s kaminom i malom kuhinjom, idealna za zimske večeri uz roštilj ili opuštanje s čašom vina. Vila nudi i značajnu prednost – solarno grijanje za vodu, što rezultira minimalnim troškovima režija. Uz sve to, vila je savršeno smještena – udaljena samo 2,5 km od plaže, 9 km od povijesnog grada Trogira, koji je pod zaštitom UNESCO-a, i samo 13 km od Zračne luke Split. Idealna lokacija za ljubitelje mora i kulture! Ako tražite dugoročni najam u mirnom i lijepom okruženju, ova vila u Vrsini je savršen izbor. Za više informacija ili da dogovorite razgledavanje, slobodno se javite. Kontakt: +385 99 848 28 31 David Bašić A luxuriously renovated villa awaits its new tenants in Vrsine. On the upper floor of the villa there are two spacious bedrooms, each equipped with a double bed and a single bed. Each room has its own bathroom with a bathtub, ideal for relaxing moments after a long day. While exploring the lower floor, you will be greeted by another bedroom that can also be used as a study, along with a bathroom with a shower and a washing machine. The heart of the villa is a spacious living room connected to a modern kitchen. From the living room you exit to a terrace with sun loungers and a heated swimming pool. To create a special atmosphere, there is also an outdoor room with a fireplace and a small kitchen, ideal for winter evenings with a barbecue or relaxing with a glass of wine. The villa also offers a significant advantage - solar water heating, which results in minimal utility costs. In addition to all this, the villa is perfectly located - only 2.5 km from the beach, 9 km from the historic town of Trogir, which is under UNESCO protection, and only 13 km from Split Airport. An ideal location for lovers of the sea and culture! If you are looking for a long-term rental in a peaceful and beautiful environment, this villa in Vrsina is the perfect choice. For more information or to arrange a viewing, please feel free to contact us. Contact: +385 99 848 28 31 David Bašić
